sentence.Network_en: I took the phone, and she went discreetly into the living room.
sentence.Network_cn: 我拿起了电话，她知趣地进了客厅。

sentence.Network_en: He glanced discreetly around the room at the other people.
sentence.Network_cn: 他谨慎地瞥了一眼房间里的其他人。

sentence.Network_en: His face will be discreetly concealed by camera angles.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过调整照相机的角度，他的脸将被巧妙地遮住。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...discern vt. 识别；领悟，认识 vi. 看清楚，辨别 [di'sə:n, -'zə:n]discreetly adv. 小心地；谨慎地discrete adj. 离散的，不连续的 n. 分立元件；独立部件 [dis'kri:t].

list.abs: behave discreetly in the workplace .在工作场所中低调行事.
The man discreetly slipped the card into his top pocket ., 那人小心翼翼地把名片放在他的上衣口袋里.
He picked up what seemedthe smallest bottle and discreetly asked the price ., 他挑了一个看上去最大的瓶女 , 大口翼翼地答了个价.
The industrial areas were discreetly apart , concealed from residential and recreational portions of the town ., 工业区被小心地设置在较远的地方 , 避开了镇上的居住区和娱乐区.

entry.def: If you are discreet, you are polite and careful in what you do or say, because you want to avoid embarrassing or offending someone.

example.ex: They were gossipy and not always discreet...
example.tran: 他们很爱传闲话，而且常常口无遮拦。

example.ex: He followed at a discreet distance.
example.tran: 他小心翼翼地尾随在后，保持着一段距离。

entry.def: If you are discreet about something you are doing, you do not tell other people about it, in order to avoid being embarrassed or to gain an advantage.

example.ex: We were very discreet about the romance...
example.tran: 我们对这段恋情很谨慎。

example.ex: She's making a few discreet inquiries with her mother's friends.
example.tran: 她旁敲侧击地向她母亲的朋友们打听过几次。

entry.tran: 不显眼的;朴素的;少的;小的
entry.def: If you describe something as discreet, you approve of it because it is small in size or degree, or not easily noticed.

means.word_mean: 1. with discretion; prudently and with wise self-restraint;

sentences.sentence: "I sent for the sergeant of the platoon both men were in and asked him to try to find out discreetly what lay behind this"

auth_sentence.content: Brides are also discreetly asked about their dress budget.
auth_sentence.res_content: Brides are also discreetly asked about their dress budget.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Brides are also discreetly asked about their dress budget.

auth_sentence.content: The shoe elongates the leg and does it discreetly.
auth_sentence.res_content: The shoe elongates the leg and does it discreetly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The shoe elongates the leg and does it discreetly.

auth_sentence.content: I was clutching the right-hand armrest, discreetly.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was clutching the right-hand armrest, discreetly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was clutching the right-hand armrest, discreetly.
